agents.name: Agent1
agents.note: Completed US-012: Refactor power modules. Created power/types.py (PowerSource, PowerMonitorState, BatteryState enums, PowerReading, PowerStats, VoltageReading, BatteryStats dataclasses, 17 constants), power/exceptions.py (6 exceptions), power/battery.py (BatteryMonitor), power/power.py (PowerMonitor), power/readers.py (8 factory functions), power/helpers.py (10 helpers). Updated power/__init__.py with 46 exports. 62 battery tests pass, 60+ power tests pass, 324 total tests pass.

agents.name: Agent3
agents.note: Completed US-043: Create simulator CLI commands. Implemented SimulatorCli class with keyboard commands (p=pause/resume, f=inject failure, c=clear failures, s=status, h=help, q=quit). Non-blocking input via background thread. 44 tests passing.
